name: Cam-Tu Nguyen
content: Cam Tu Nguyen (副教授） 人工智能学院 首页 学院概况 院况概览 现任领导 师资队伍 教职工名录 人才培养 本科教学 研究生教学 研究生招生 科学研究 科研动态 新闻动态 党群建设 通知公告 支部建设 学习教育 群团工作 规章制度 资料汇编 热点链接 诚聘英才 English Version Cam Tu Nguyen (副教授） I obtained my bachelor degree and master degree from Vietnam National University, Hanoi in 2005 and 2008, respectively. In 2011, I received my Ph.D in information science from Tohoku University, Japan. From 2012 to 2015, I joined LAMDA group, Nanjing University as a postdoctoral researcher. At the same time, from 2005 to 2017, I was also a lecturer at Vietnam National University, Hanoi. Since 2017 until 2019, I worked as an assistant researcher at Software school, Nanjing University. Currently, I am an associate professor at AI school, Nanjing University.My research interest includes natural language processing and machine learning (i.e, multi-view, multi-instance, multi-label learning). More specifically, I focused in tasks such as tagging, text clustering, image annotation and text labeling. Recently, I have been working on building intelligent dialog systems, such as a customer service dialog system, or a chatbot which is able to debate with humans in controversial topics on the internet.Email: ncamtu@nju.edu.cnPhone: +86-18951991071 地址：江苏省南京市栖霞区仙林大道163号 邮编：210023 电话：(86)-25-89680690 传真：(86)-25-89680690 Copyright © 南京大学人工智能学院 版权所有 人工智能学院
